subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: This year’s Indianapolis Colts team was not the most talented, Coach Tony Dungy said, but it was the closest, bonded by the on- and off-field trials it had endured.
snippet: This year’s Indianapolis Colts team was not the most talented, Coach Tony Dungy said, but it was the closest, bonded by the on- and off-field trials it had endured.
